definitions.definition: The bending of a wave around an obstacle.
The breaking up of an electromagnetic wave as it passes a geometric structure (e.g. a slit ), followed by reconstruction of the wave by interference .

main_definition: ( physics ) The bending of a wave around an obstacle.
secondary_definitions: ( quantum mechanics ) The breaking up of an electromagnetic wave as it passes a geometric structure (e.g. a slit ), followed by reconstruction of the wave by interference .
